required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Aesthetic Performance of an Injective Treatment for the Inner Thighs, Knees and Arms
clinical_study.official_title: Aesthetic Performance and Tolerance Evaluation of an Injective Intradermal Treatment for the Inner Thighs, Knees and Arms

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to investigate the efficacy of the "SUNEKOS® Body" in woman aged 40-65 years with skin flaccidity of the inner thighs, knees and arms.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner arm skin laxity clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin laxity clinical grade, according to a visual score from 1 (no flaccidity) to 5 (very severe flaccidity)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner arm skin roughness clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin roughness clinical grade, according to a visual score from 1 (no roughness) to 5 (very severe roughness)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner thigh skin laxity clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin laxity clinical grade, according to a visual score from 1 (no flaccidity) to 5 (very severe flaccidity)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner thigh skin roughness clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin laxity clinical grade, according to a clinical score from 1 (no roughness) to 5 (very severe roughness)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner knee skin laxity clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin laxity clinical grade, according to a clinical score from 1 (no flaccidity) to 5 (very severe flaccidity)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of inner knee skin roughness clinical grade
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin laxity clinical grade, according to a visual score from 1 (no roughness) to 5 (very severe roughness)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of superficial skin hydration
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Skin electrical capacitance value was measured mono-laterally on the right or left inner arm, thigh and knee with Corneometer CM825 (Courage - Khazaka, Köln, Germany). The measure of the skin capacitance properties is an indirect expression of its hydration level.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of deep skin hydration
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Tissue dielectric constant value of superficial and deep skin layers was measured mono-laterally on the right or left inner arm, thigh and knee with MoistureMeterD (Delfin Technologies, Kuopio - Finland)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of skin density
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: A little skin area of about 7 cm2 (at level of inner arm was pinched, in standardized conditions, using a specific device. Because of this "pinch" the skin profile changes depending on cutaneous density; when the skin is slack the "pinch" forms a lot of wrinkles. A picture of the skin pinched was taken thanks to Primos compact portable device (GFMesstechnik); Primos software is able to measure skin principal profilometric parameters.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of photographic documentation
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 48 hours after the last injection procedure, after 8 weeks, after 16 weeks
primary_outcome.description: 2D pictures of the inner arm, thigh and knee

clinical_study.condition: Skin Flaccidity Inner Thighs Knees Arms

arm_group.description: The 1st treatment was performed during T0 visit, after the basal evaluations planned by the study procedure and repeated 3 more times with an interval of 1 week (T2i, T3i and T4i).

intervention.description: SUNEKOS ® Body is a medical device (class III). The study product was injected at level of the inner thighs, knees and arms by needle (29 G) using the interstitial fluid technique (IFT)
